author: pburba
msg: Fix validate.c to follow the string encoding rules of the ebcdic port.
In the ebcdic port strings outside of mod_dav_svn and mod_dav_authz are
generally assumed to be encoded in utf-8.  validate.c was still operating on
ebcdic strings.  Now it's two functions work on utf-8 strings; also fixed the
two mod_dav_svn callers of svn_mime_type_validate which passed ebcdic args.
Handle incoming utf-8 string args rather than ebcdic.
Convert string args to svn_mime_type_validate to utf-8

author: jaa
msg: (test_list): Skip lock_and_exebit1 and lock_and_exebit2 on non-posix

author: jaa
msg: The exebit tests should be Skipped on win32, thanks to Erik Huelsmann for
pointing this out. Also fix a comment.
(test_list): Skip lock_and_exebit1 and lock_and_exebit2 on non-posix
